title: Edward Cufaude - The Rhythm Creator EP + Album Promo Tracks (Ele
description:
Edward Cufaude

Independant Musician

Legal to Download & Distribute (I own the copyrights) :-)

Electronic based, if you like old style prodigy, crystal method, chemical brothers, orbital etc then you might enjoy my tracks. Give them a try.



Readme File Included

-------------------



Thank you for downloading this torrent. 6 tracks 160Kps Mp3 files. It is 100% legal to download and distribute as long as you keep this readme text file in there or credit me as the composer. Thanks :-) 

I am an independent musician and have released this torrent as a way of promoting myself and also my upcoming album called "Sound Sunrise" to be released 15th May 2008.



Included are the tracks - Chase Me, Beatbox, Overdrive



All from my debut EP release "The Rhythm Creator EP" Released 3rd December 2007. Available from Napster, eMusic, Rhapsody, Amazon MP3 and soon iTunes (They are terribly slow) and hopefully soon my own web site, (I just gotta work all that stuff out).



Also included are two preview tracks from my upcoming album "Sound Sunrise" (released 15th May 2008)



Headrush (Pre-Release Album Promo Version)

Venom (Pre-release Album Promo Version) (Instrumental)

A Blue Moon (Pre-Release Album Promo Version)



I gonna change them a bit, work on them a bit more etc before the album release, that is why they are pre-release versions. + a bonus track Venom (Cheesey Bouncy Hard House Mix) which will be exclusive to this torrent (Just a bit of fun I had)



There are loads of different ways you can help to support me as a musician if you like the included tracks (which don&#039;t involve any money...)



1. Seed this torrent

2. Contact me and comment on my tracks :-) Good or Bad.

3. Distribute my tracks to friends who might be interested. Including this text file :-)

4. Add me as a friend on Myspace

5. Vote for my tracks on www.ourstage.com

6. Visit/Promote my music making blog at www.rhythmcreation.com (Maybe even write a guest post if you know something of interest to musicians)

7. Visit/Promote my personal web site at www.edwardcufaude.com

8. Use my tracks for things such as YouTube videos etc for FREE/UNCOMMERCIAL projects, as long as you credit me as the composer.



Sample Credit

-------------

Sample of Boa Constrictor Hissing used on the track Venom was recorded by Kjell Persson from The Freesound Project (http://freesound.iua.upf.edu/)



Thanks for downloading my tracks :-)



Edward Cufaude



www.edwardcufaude.com

www.rhythmcreation.com
